tagline: Statistical modeling, experiment design, and data storytelling that drives real business decisions
pros: Full-stack analytics: SQL exploration through predictive modeling to executive presentation
Rigorous experiment design — A/B tests, power analysis, causal inference
Communicates results as business recommendations, not just statistical findings
Starts simple (logistic regression) and escalates complexity only when justified
cons: Doesn't build data pipelines or deploy models to production
Analysis takes time — rushing the exploration phase produces bad models
Statistical rigor can feel slow when stakeholders want quick answers

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
